Author: phmwls
Text: Thank you for your encouragement, your words remind me that this has to pass because I know it will pass for you. You’re so kind and your lovable-ness is showing through ❤️

Author: catsinsunglassess
Text: I’m experiencing heartbreak and feelings of being unlovable as well. I absolutely use food as punishment when i feel this way- i don’t eat and berate myself when i do. I totally relate to the things you said. All i can offer is that it’s not forever, this will pass, and if you are very worried about feeling unlovable- cultivate a few things in your life that give it meaning and that will possibly be valuable to a future partner. This will absolutely pass. I hope you are able to one day find what you are looking for.
